name: CyberRangeCZ Practical Modules
description: Learning sequence for subcase 1d in the CyberRangeCZ environment, aimed at operations teams.

activities.description: NG-SIEM gathers telemetry from the CyberRangeCZ environment and raises a prioritised alert.
The NG-SOC analyst validates the alert and selects the appropriate CACAO playbook.
NG-SOC sends the execution order to NG-SOAR together with the incident parameters.
NG-SOAR interprets the CACAO sequence and prepares the required automated and manual actions.
The specific CACAO playbook against ransomware is enabled, mapping containment and recovery controls to the available connectors.
The playbook performs enrichment, containment and notification tasks on the affected assets.
Response time and effectiveness metrics are recorded for later tracking.
A connector resilience test is executed to confirm availability of critical integrations after containment.
CICMS Operator centralises evidence and reports associated with the incident while the playbook is running.
CTI-SS supplies threat intelligence to enrich indicators and determine countermeasures.
The playbook and standards library (NVD/NIST, MITRE ATT&CK) guides the adaptation of the response plan.
NG-SOAR updates the incident status in NG-SOC/NG-SIEM and consolidates the case documentation.
CICMS Operator compiles the post-incident report and links the lessons learnt in the playbook library.
The post-incident control board is convened to present technical findings, validate corrective actions and plan continual improvement.
